${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:PistolShot.NAME: Pistol Shot
${modID}:PistolShot.DESCRIPTION: Ranged NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy and the one behind it.

${modID}:InstantSleepDart.NAME: Instant Sleep Dart
${modID}:InstantSleepDart.DESCRIPTION: Ranged NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy and immediately Sleep them for one turn.

${modID}:SleepDart.NAME: Sleep Dart
${modID}:SleepDart.DESCRIPTION: Ranged NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy, next turn, Sleep them for one turn.

${modID}:ScopedInCrossbow.NAME: Scoped-in crossbow
${modID}:ScopedInCrossbow.DESCRIPTION: Ranged NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy.

${modID}:Grenade.NAME: Grenade
${modID}:Grenade.DESCRIPTION: Ranged NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:IncendiaryBolt.NAME: Incendiary bolt
${modID}:IncendiaryBolt.DESCRIPTION: Ranged NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy and apply !M! stacks of Burn to it.

${modID}:CombustionBolt.NAME: Combustion bolt
${modID}:CombustionBolt.DESCRIPTION: Ranged NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy and apply !M! stacks of Burn to ALL enemies.

${modID}:HardenedBolt.NAME: Hardened bolt
${modID}:HardenedBolt.DESCRIPTION: Ranged NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy.

${modID}:PiercingStab.NAME: Piercing stab
${modID}:PiercingStab.DESCRIPTION: Melee NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy and !M! % to the enemy to its right.

${modID}:ChokeOut.NAME: Choke out
${modID}:ChokeOut.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, deal !D! damage and Sleep the targeted enemy.

${modID}:SummonRatAttack.NAME: Summon rat attack
${modID}:SummonRatAttack.DESCRIPTION: Gore NL Exhaust NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies 5 times. The fear effect can be applied at most once.

${modID}:SummonWeeperAttack.NAME: Summon weeper attack
${modID}:SummonWeeperAttack.DESCRIPTION: Fear NL Exhaust NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy.

${modID}:SummonBloodflyAttack.NAME: Summon bloodfly attack
${modID}:SummonBloodflyAttack.DESCRIPTION: Fear NL Exhaust NL Deal !D! damage !M! times to ALL enemies, each hit applies the Fear.
